content: fantastic thank you! Write a long form piece in the style and tone of copywriting genius, legendary Advertising Hall of Famer George Lois about OSHA Forklift Certification, explore the different schools of thought on the subject, share any tactics and strategies on the subject, and other interesting insights around the subject; who are the impactful people related to the subject, and what can we learn from them? The Subject: "Why Traditional OSHA Certification Programs Are Outdated and Ineffective"
